resources.string: The intent of this app is to conduct research into the smartphone usage. The app is made in combination with the [institution].
This app operates by detecting when the screen is off and on and storing the difference. The app also automatically turns itself on again when the phone is restarted.
The data protected in the app is secured by the Armadillo - Encrypted Shared preferences (https://github.com/patrickfav/armadillo)
Do you consent for data collection to begin. Please uninstall this app if you do not.
